cause.description:
Basically Kev's ping pong table looks messed up because we spilled a drink on it and we're gonna be really screwed if we can't fix it/ buy a new one. If anyone has ideas of how to fix Warped Wood or donate money to this cause it'd be awesome.
1. Kev's awesome
2. Kev will be in big trouble if this isnt problem isn't fixed
3. You Owe Me
cause.mission:
Raise Money so kev doesnt need to buy a new one
If you wanna give money just message me (Jonathan D)
cause.name: Kev's PingPong Table
